title: TDR - Trade Duty Refund | Richard Krempel's Profile
description: Meet Richard Krempel, a seasoned customs consultant with expertise in EU customs compliance, AEO certification, customs permits, and operational management. Member of the Trade Duty Refund NL management team, fluent in Dutch and English
bio: Richard Krempel is a highly experienced customs consultant with a background spanning both Dutch customs and the private sector. He specializes in developing and implementing compliant customs solutions and has overseen successful operational transformations for various organizations. Richard is a member of the TR NL management team
skills: <ul class="interline"><li><strong>Customs Compliance & Reassessments</strong>: Richard is well-versed in conducting reassessments of customs processes, particularly in the context of Authorized Economic Operator (AEO) certification, helping organizations maintain or achieve compliance status.</li><li><strong>Customs Permits & Regulatory Expertise</strong>:  He provides expert guidance in the application and management of various customs permits, ensuring clients meet all regulatory requirements efficiently.</li><li><strong>Operational Customs Management</strong>: With extensive experience managing customs departments in the private sector, Richard excels in operational structuring and restructuring to optimize customs workflows and ensure regulatory adherence.</li></ul>
geo: Richardâ€™s expertise is principally in the EU.
